description:
The best way to book your perfect hotel! 
The brand new design includes bigger images to help you make the right choice and you can also enjoy these fantastic features: 

New Features:
- Homepage features 'Tonight's Local Deals' and recently viewed hotels for your convenience.  The best way to get deep discounts on hotels in your area.
- Easy-to-use map to discover all the hotels around you.
- Sign in once and done.
- Securely stored credit card or payment details for fast, smart and safe bookings.  Great for repeat bookings!
- Don't forget to keep track of your free nights you've already collected with our Welcome Rewards loyalty program, collect 10 and you'll get 1 night free.
- Look up hotel confirmation number or details on your past, current and future hotel bookings, even when you don’t have access to the Internet. 
- 24/7 in-app click-to-call customer support.
trackCensoredName: Hotels.com - Hotel booking and last minute hotel deals
trackName: Hotels.com - Hotel booking and last minute hotel deals
releaseNotes:
- Optimized for iOS 8 and tweaked to look beautiful on the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus.
- We've heard you loud and clear, so you can now sign into the app using Facebook Connect.
- And as always we've fixed some bugs!

*Thanks for your feedback! It's really useful so please keep telling us what you think by reviewing our app and rating us 5 stars.*
